#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,x1,y1,ans,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4,cx1,cy1,cx2,cy2;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ans=0;
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
        ans+=(abs(y2-y1)*abs(x2-x1));
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);
        ans+=(abs(y3-y4)*abs(x3-x4));
        if(max(x1,x3)>min(x2,x4)||max(y1,y3)>min(y2,y4))
        {
            printf("%d\n",ans);
        }
        else
        {
            cx1=max(x1,x3);
            cy1=max(y1,y3);
            cx2=min(x2,x4);
            cy2=min(y2,y4);
            ans=ans-(abs(cx1-cx2)*abs(cy1-cy2));
            printf("%d\n",ans);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
